headline: NBC changes beloved NBA broadcast format, confuses fans
summary: Major sports league contracts don't change hands often. But on Oct. 21, Comcast's (CMCSA) NBCUniversal wrested the U.S.'s second most-popular — and fastest-growing worldwide — league out of Warner Bros. Discovery (WBD) subsidiary TNT's hands. NBC Universal's broadcast of its first NBA game in 23 ...

headline: Market Bets Rise on Warner Bros Discovery Options Ahead of Zaslav’s Possible Swan Song
summary: The sharks are circling media conglomerate Warner Bros Discovery, causing the stock’s options volume to heat up. Yesterday, WBD had nine unusually active options with volume double its 30-day average. The activity offers investors several profitable opportunities.

headline: Analysts Estimate Comcast (CMCSA) to Report a Decline in Earnings: What to Look Out for
summary: Comcast (CMCSA) doesn't possess the right combination of the two key ingredients for a likely earnings beat in its upcoming report. Get prepared with the key expectations.

headline: Comcast Advertising Makes Traditional TV Biddable for the First Time
summary: NEW YORK, October 23, 2025--Comcast Advertising makes traditional TV biddable for the first time with new programmatic linear solution, available with FreeWheel’s Buyer Cloud.

headline: Creator Television® Launches On-Demand Offerings on Plex and Xumo Play
summary: Sabio Holdings (TSXV: SBIO) (OTCQB: SABOF) (the "Company" or "Sabio"), a Los Angeles-based ad-tech company specializing in helping top global brands reach, engage, and validate (R.E.V.) streaming TV audiences, today announced its owned and operated streaming network, Creator Television® (Creator TV) has launched its AVOD (ad-supported video-on-demand) offering on Plex and Xumo Play.
